Reviews.Title: Worst laptop i have owned.
Reviews.Author: wendy
Reviews.Content: I have to kept sending the laptop to sony to have them fix it first the screen stops working then a week after it comes back the laptop will not turn on have to send it back again. i will not recommend this to my worst enemy!

Reviews.Title: It is not FULL HD Laptop!
Reviews.Author: Dimitri
Reviews.Content: I bought this laptop couple of days ago and after switching it on, I see pixels very well. I was very dissapointed and what is very important, I opened internet based resolution tests and it tells me 1580x860 than 1920x1080 (FULL HD)  It might be a problem of matrix. My 2008 model sony vaio is more crips in terms of the display than this one.

Reviews.Title: Not the laptop I ordered (Order # 108-7332914-6849837)
Reviews.Author: Armando Osuna
Reviews.Content: The Sony Vaio laptop I received is a lower spec model than the one I've ordered. My purchase was for the touch-screen model Sony Vaio SVF15212CXW and the laptop received was the Sony Vaio SVF152C29L, which is not touch-screen - one of the main features that drove my purchase.Unfortunately, I have been travelling and it was only now that I was able to check the laptop received. When I tried to return it I was notified that the time allowed for returns had expired, therefore was not allowed. Needless to say how disappointed I am, as the correct model should have been delivered in the first place.Now, I have a laptop which doesn't feature what I want and that cost me more than it should have as the laptop I received can be up to $xx cheaper than the one I did ordered.I would at least like to receive an online money certificate for the difference in price between the two models, but I don't see how to do this. Hope Amazon can help.Thanks.

Reviews.Title: NOT A TOUCHSCREEN!!!
Reviews.Author: Nino
Reviews.Content: If you are looking for an up to date laptop then this is the one, but read the product description carefully if you are looking for a touch screen laptop, because this one is not!!!

Reviews.Title: I don' like Windows 8 screen layout IS DIFFICAULT but I like Windows 7 better!! NOW THE LAPTOP won't power up now at all!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Stephen Swinson
Reviews.Content: I don' like Windows 8 screen layout IS DIFFICAULT TO USE but I like Windows 7 better!! NOW THE LAPTOP won't power up now at all!!!!!!!!  iS THER ANY WAY YOU CA DOWN GRADE IT FOR ME?
